title: Vietmanese-Style Fable Mushroom Rice Bowl (V)
keywords: Vietnamese, Mushroom, Rice Bowl, Plant-Based, Vegan, Fable

method.step: Add your Basmati Rice and your ml of cold water with a pinch of saltto a pot with a lit and bring to the boil over a neigh heat
Once boiling reduce the heat to very low and cook, coverd for 10-12 minutes  or until all the water has been absorbed and the rice is cooked
Once cooked remove from the hear and keep coverd untill serving
Top, tail, peel and chop your carrot(s) into matchsticks
Wash yout lettuce then pat it dry withh kitched paper and shread finely
Slice half your red chilli(es) into rounds and finely chop the rest
(If you dont want alot of spice remove the seeds)
Peel and finely chop (or greate) your garlic
Bash your pulled mushrooms with a rolling pin to break them up
heat a large wide based pan with a generous drizzle of vegetable oil over a medium heigh heat
once hot add the bashed pulled mushrooms with a generous pint of salt and cook cor 5-6 minutes  or untril browned breaking them up with a wooden spoon as you go. These are your piulled mushrooms
While the mushrooms are cooking zest half your lime(s)
Crush your peanuts ith a rolling pin
Add the finely chopped chilli to a bowl with the juce of the chopped lime(s), half your soy sauce, half the choped garlic, your sugar and your tbsp of cold water
Give everything a good mix up this is you Vietnamese style dressing
Once the pulled fable mushrooms have browned add the remaining soy sauce, remaining chopped garlic and lime zest to the pan
Stor it all togetherand cook for a final 1 minutes  or untill fragrent. These are your Vietnamese style dressing and garnish with the reserved chillie rounds and chrushed peanuts Enjoy
